name: Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (March 25)
description: March 2025 experimental preview of Gemini 2.5 Pro with always-on thinking mode. This was the first Gemini 2.5 Pro preview release, featuring enhanced reasoning capabilities.
notes: Preview model released March 2025. Experimental version with thinking mode always enabled. Now redirects to 05-06 version automatically.
